questions.text: A 'brownie' is what kind of fish?
questions.explanation:
Smallmouth bass.

	There are 9 genera and 30 species in the bass family.

questions.text: Small mouth bass build nests. Who builds them - the male or female?
questions.explanation:
me & male.

	They are found from Lake Champlain southwest to the Appalachian region.

questions.text: What is a male bass sometimes called?
questions.explanation:
Buck.

	This is probably just one name of several they are known as depending on the region you are talking about.

questions.text: What fish family is the gizzard shad a member of?
questions.explanation:
Herring.

	The shad is a common name of any of several species of food fish.It is thicker and deeper in length proportion then the herring.

questions.text: According to numerous surveys and opinions what is the most popular fly fishing fish of the following?
questions.explanation:
Trout.

	In reality trout belong to the salmon family.

Catfish.

	Bullhead is a common name for several North American catfish. They are also called a bullpout and a hornpout.

questions.text: A migratory rainbow trout is called what?
questions.explanation:
Steelhead.

	Actually a steelhead is a seagoing rainbow trout.

questions.text: Piscivorous fish feed on other fish?
questions.explanation:
True.

	The word piscivorous means feeding or subsiding on fish.

questions.text: What is another name for the king salmon?
questions.explanation:
Chinook salmon.

	It is the largest of the five Pacific salmon species.

questions.text: What kind of fish is sometimes called 'Old Hogjaws'?
questions.explanation:
Large mouth bass.

	Most bass are included in the sunfish family (Centrarchidea), the sea bass family (Serranidea) or the temperate bass family (Percichthyidea).
